body_html:
@prb12
My tensorflow's information:
TensorFlow version: 0.11.0rc1
Installtion method:

# Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, CPU only, Python 2.7
$ export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

@lukaszkaiser
Sorry, I'm not sure if I understand your solution.

Use tf.Variable instead of tf.get_variable

Do you mean I need to change tf.Variable to tf.get_variable in Adam?
But the optimizer has been wrapped, now I can't find where Adam applies these variables. Could you give me some good ideas?

body:
@prb12 
My tensorflow's information:
TensorFlow version: 0.11.0rc1
Installtion method: 
```
# Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, CPU only, Python 2.7
$ export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
```
@lukaszkaiser 
Sorry, I'm not sure if I understand your solution.

> Use tf.Variable instead of tf.get_variable

Do you mean I need to change tf.Variable to tf.get_variable in Adam? 
But the optimizer has been wrapped, now I can't find where Adam applies these variables. Could you give me some good ideas?
